metadata.title: Free AI Undress Tool Online | Remove Clothing from Any Image
metadata.description: With just one click, strip away clothes! A powerful and realistic AI tool that reveals nudity in any image. 100% free with no limits. Try our free AI undress web app now for instant results!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | Undress AI – Protecting Your Privacy
privacy.description: Learn how Undress AI collects, uses, and safeguards your personal data. We commit to protecting your privacy: all uploaded images are auto-deleted after 24 hours and no data is shared with third parties.
privacy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, AI image processing, personal information security, GDPR compliance, data deletion, privacy protection

about.title: About Us | Undress AI – Advanced AI Image Processing Technology
about.description: Discover Undress AI’s mission, technical advantages, and team. We strive to develop cutting-edge AI image processing tech to deliver secure, efficient AI services.
about.keywords: AI image processing, artificial intelligence technology, deep learning, image recognition, AI services, technical team, innovation

terms.title: Terms of Service | Undress AI – Terms & Conditions
terms.description: Read the terms and conditions for using Undress AI services, including user responsibilities, service limits, intellectual property rights, and other legal provisions.
terms.keywords: terms of service, user agreement, legal terms, service limitations, intellectual property, user responsibilities

contact.title: Contact Us | Undress AI – Get Help & Support
contact.description: Reach out to the Undress AI team for technical support, partnership inquiries, or feedback. We offer 24/7 online support and quick responses to your needs.
contact.keywords: contact us, technical support, customer service, feedback, partnership inquiries, online support, help center

hero.title: AI Undress Technology
hero.subtitle: Advanced AI technology for fast image processing

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.description: Select the image you want to process
upload.networkError: Network error, please try again later

items.a1: AI undress is a tool that uses AI to digitally remove clothing from images or videos. It uses image inpainting algorithms to analyze and manipulate visual data, creating the illusion of undressed subjects.
items.a2: Just upload a photo and select the area of clothing to remove. The more precisely you mark, the better the results.
items.q3: How long does the generation process take?
items.a3: It depends on server load, so it can range from one second to one minute.
items.q4: Can I use AI undress for free?
items.a4: Yes, you can use our generator for free with no request limits.
items.a5: The safety of AI undress depends on the user's intention. This tool should be used responsibly, with explicit consent before processing images, and only for artistic, educational, or non-commercial purposes.
items.a6: All uploaded files are automatically deleted after 24 hours, and generated content is retained for up to 30 days.
items.q7: Are these generated results publicly accessible?
items.a7: No, your results are only available to you and are not shared with third parties.

footer.cookieNotice: This website uses cookies in accordance with our privacy policy to provide you with a better experience.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide when using our AI image processing services. We are committed to safeguarding your privacy and ensuring your personal data is handled securely.

dataCollection.title: Information Collection
dataCollection.description: We may collect the following types of information:

items.uploaded: Uploaded image files (used only for processing purposes)
items.technical: Technical information (IP address, browser type, device information)

dataUsage.title: Information Use
dataUsage.description: We use the collected information to:

items.processing: Process your images and provide AI services
items.improvement: Improve our service quality and user experience
items.support: Provide technical support and customer service
items.security: Maintain service security and prevent abuse

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We implement the following measures to protect your data:

items.encryption: All data transmissions are encrypted with SSL/TLS
items.autoDelete: Uploaded images are automatically deleted after 24 hours
items.accessControl: Strict access controls and permission management

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We commit to protecting your privacy:
dataSharing.noSharing: We do not share, sell, or disclose your personal information or uploaded images with any third parties.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience:

items.analytics: Analytics cookies: help us understand site usage
items.preferences: Preferences cookies: remember your language and settings

items.access: Right of access: view the information we hold about you
items.correction: Right to correct: rectify inaccurate personal data
items.deletion: Right to deletion: request deletion of your personal data
items.objection: Right to object: object to the processing of your personal data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any significant changes will be notified on the website. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Undress AI services, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Undress AI provides AI-based image processing services including, but not limited to, image editing, content generation, and image analysis features.

items.processing: AI image processing and editing services

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: When using our services, you agree to:

items.lawful: Use the services only for lawful purposes
items.consent: Ensure you have the right to upload and process any images
items.noHarm: Not use the services for harmful or malicious activities
items.compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

prohibitedUse.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUse.description: You may not use our services for:

items.copyright: Infringing on others' intellectual property rights

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: Our services and related technologies are protected by intellectual property laws:

items.ownership: Undress AI owns all rights to the services
items.license: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive license to use the services
items.userContent: You retain ownership of your uploaded content but grant us the right to process it
items.generated: Ownership of AI-generated content is determined by applicable law

items.uptime: We strive for high availability but do not guarantee 100% uptime
items.maintenance: We may perform scheduled maintenance and updates
items.interruption: Service may be temporarily interrupted due to technical issues
items.modification: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the services

dataAndPrivacy.title: Data and Privacy
dataAndPrivacy.description: Your data handling is subject to our Privacy Policy:

items.processing: We process your data only to provide the services
items.retention: Uploaded images are automatically deleted after 24 hours
items.security: We take reasonable measures to protect your data
items.sharing: We do not share your personal data with third parties

dataAndPrivacy.privacyNote: For detailed data processing information, please refer to our

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law:

items.asIs: The services are provided "as is" without any warranties
items.damages: We are not liable for any indirect, special, or consequential damages
items.liability: Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid to us
items.force: We are not liable for losses due to force majeure events

items.userTermination: You may stop using our services at any time
items.ourTermination: We may terminate your access for violating the terms
items.effect: Upon termination, your access will immediately cease

items.jurisdiction: The laws of the People's Republic of China
items.disputes: Any disputes should be resolved through amicable negotiations
items.court: If negotiations fail, disputes will be submitted to a competent court
items.language: The Chinese version of these terms is the accurate version
